DNI Instructions

Installation Instructions

===================================Step 1==============================

Paste the following code into the <head> section of the web page where you want to display dynamic numbers.

<!-- Convirza Script Begins -->

<script defer src="https://{{ dniHost }}/dni.js?app_id=CT" > </script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function dniLoadingTimer() { 
	if (typeof(getDNIRecord) == "function") {
		getDNIRecord("{{ dni_code }}", "{{ dniHost }}");
	} else {
		setTimeout(dniLoadingTimer, 100); 
	} 
} 
setTimeout(dniLoadingTimer, 100); 
</script>

<!-- Convirza Script Ends -->

===================================Step 2==============================

Paste the HTML code into the <body> of the web pages where you want to
display dynamic numbers on your web site. If you are combining source and url
dni into one element, include both class ids into a single element.
For example: <span class="myClass lmc_track">

HTML code for {{ dni.destination_url }} ==> <span class="{{ dni.dni_element }}">Default Phone Number Here</span>

===================================Step 3==============================

If using URL-based DNI, copy and paste the parameters below and add them to URLs linking to your
host domain. For example

http://www.website.com/page.html?lmc_track=8886663456
